# VEHICLE::GET_SUBMARINE_IS_UNDER_DESIGN_DEPTH

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Get whether the submarine is under its design depth
